text: According to the (2021) estimation, the West Bengal state has over 29,144,763 Muslims, who form 28-29% of the state's population. The vast majority of Muslims in West Bengal are Bengali Muslims numbering around 2.7 crore and comprising 25% of the state population, urdu speaking muslims comprise 3% of the state population. ==Related pages== * Christianity in West Bengal * Hinduism in West Bengal == References == West Bengal Category:west Bengal
title: Islam in West Bengal
